description.displayText: I have two daughters, my youngest has Autism. Sam is always on time, has excellent communication skills (always able to reach her), her own vehicle, has no issue staying late, and is wonderful with both my daughters. She is an absolute pleasure and am so pleased and grateful I was able to find her! Her personality, charm, energy, and attention to detail are some of the reasons I chose to hire her in the first place. She still works with us and when she's completed college and graduate school we will be sad to see her go.

description.displayText: I was disappointed that this caregiver could not meet with me.   At first she stated she would make the time available for a specific date we agreed to, but on follow up, stated it would be easier for her if we moved the time, and the location,   closer to her home rather than mine.   I felt a prospective employee should come to the town where the  job is, not the other way around, and when I tried different times but not a new location, she did not respond. very disappointing.

At first she stated she would make the time available for a specific date we agreed to, but on follow up, stated it would be easier for her if we moved the time, and the location,   closer to her home rather than mine.   I felt a prospective employee should come to the town where the  job is, not the other way around, and when I tried different times but not a new location, she did not respond. very disappointing.

description.displayText:
Dear Samantha P. 

Thank you for your interest in the babysitter position.  We appreciate you taking the time to apply for this position. Although we were very impressed by what you have to offer, we are unable to offer you a position. However, we will keep your contact in our current file for consideration at a later date should a vacancy open up again with our family. 

We appreciate your interest with our family we wish you every success in your endeavors.

Yours truly
Willie and MariaElena

description.displayText: Sam has been wonderful with helping 2 of my children after school.  She is positive, helpful, fun and responsible.  My daughter adores her --Sam helps her stay focused on her homework and is also someone she likes to spend time with.
